attributes.additional_details: We would like to see fireworks banned from public sale! we believe they should only be used for organised displays, we live in a built up council area as do thousands across the country and at this time of year we are all affected by mindless youths throwing fireworks at innocent people and causing general nuisance with the use of fireworks? thousands of people and animals are injured each year from fireworks and fires started etc? please help us ban them from public sale and put a stop to this mindless behaviour
